dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C.K. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: Pascal VOC is a famous benchmark for the object detection task, which annotates 20 different object categories. In total, Pascal VOC 2007 contains 9963 images collected from the Flickr photo-sharing website. Totally, 24640 objects are annotated in the dataset.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: Cityscapes captures high-quality video in different cities and includes 5000 images which are manually selected from 27 different cities. All images of Cityscapes are collected in good weather conditions.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: Foggy Cityscapes simulates the foggy weather based on the Cityscapes dataset, inheriting the pixel-level labels of Cityscapes. Therefore, Cityscapes and Foggy Cityscapes share the same bounding boxes annotation.
dcterms:title: Foggy Cityscapes
